title: Sound On: Tax Hike on Wealthy, China Sanctions
itunes:title: Sound On: Tax Hike on Wealthy, China Sanctions
description:
Guests: Sarah Chamberlain, President and CEO of Republican Main Street Partnership, Rep. Carolyn Maloney, a Democrat representing New York's 12th district, and Hagar Chemali, CEO of Greenwich Media Strategies.
